questions.question_text: Which actions represent best practices for using AWS IAM? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AD
The answers are A&D

Selected Answer: AD
A. Configure a strong password policy.
D. Rotate access keys on a regular basis.

Best practices for using AWS IAM include configuring a strong password policy to ensure that users create secure passwords, and rotating access keys on a regular basis to prevent unauthorized access to resources.

Selected Answer: AD
A & D are the right ones.
A and D

questions.question_text:
A company is running a monolithic on-premises application that does not scale and is difficult to maintain. The company has a plan to migrate the application to AWS and divide the application into microservices.

Which best practice of the AWS Well-Architected Framework is the company following with this plan?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Loose coupling is an approach to interconnecting the components in a system or network so that those components, also called elements, depend on each other to the least extent practicable. Coupling refers to the degree of direct knowledge that one element has of another.

Selected Answer: D
D is correct

Selected Answer: D
D for sure

Selected Answer: D
The answer is D
We are talking about a monolithic application. Answer is D
vote for D
